title: The Wizard's Towers
description: Colin, a young bard traveling the world to learn his magic and music, finds himself trying to rescued a kidnapped princess from the wizard Rexor's fiendish towers. You make the decisions for Colin as you both dare the Dragon Roads to find Thaya, solve riddles and diabolic puzzles, avoid hungry monsters, and maybe earn treasures beyond belief!
author: Rhondi Vilott
